landing-page.headline: Governing Bodies
landing-page.subline: The Infinex Council is comprised of 5 seats, each responsible for a core aspect of a DAO
landing-page.second-subline: Find links to each core component of the Infinex Governance System
landing-page.tabs-subline: The current members of each Infinex Governing Body

button-cards.all-members-subline: View the history of past council elections and vote in any currently open elections.
button-cards.sccp-subline: View the current status of all SCCPs and SIPs.
button-cards.forum-subline: Join the community governance discussion in realtime.
button-cards.records-subline: View the voting history of all governance proposals.

vote-banner.title: See live voting results as the come in
vote-banner.subtitle: Keep track of who is winning the election. Remember to vote!

nominate-banner.title: Nominate yourself
nominate-banner.subtitle: Nominate yourself for a council and get elected

button.not-cc: You must be a CC to nominate

councils.headline: Council structure
councils.subline: Meet each of the nominees for the new and up and coming elections for the Infinex governing bodies, each responsible for a core aspect of the DAO.
councils.view-member-sub: View all members in detail and view past elections and pitches

tr.subline: The Trader seat will be responsible for representing the interests of the broader CeFi and DeFi ecosystem, particularly centralized exchange traders. Their inclusion ensures that the spectrum of opinions within the crypto ecosystem is more fully represented in decisions made by the Infinex Council.

ec.subline: The Ecosystem seats will represent the Synthetix community. A councillor in the Ecosystem seat will advocate for the interests of the broader Synthetix ecosystem, and their place on the council is designed to foster alignment of interests among protocols.

cc.subline: The CC seat will represent the Core Contributors of Infinex, which seeks to ensure that there is always a voice on the council with a deep understanding of the protocol's existing implementations.

tc.subline: The Treasury seat will be responsible for managing the treasury and will use funds to bootstrap the project and ensure its long-term sustainability.

profile-not-found.subheadline: The provided address is not a valid wallet address or profile does not exists for user

completion-card.headline: Your Submission Summary is {{percentage}} Complete
completion-card.subline: Complete all of the submission requirements to enhance your chances of becoming a council member

vote.headline: Voting
vote.subline: Chose one nominee that you want to vote for in this election. Remember to check out their profile & pitch to see what they represent.
vote.vote-in-progress: You have not completed all of your ballots for this voting period. Below indicates which ones you completed and which ones have not. Click on the plus icon to cast your vote.
vote.vote-finished: You have completed all of your ballots for this voting period. You can always change your casted votes within the voting period.
vote.not-in-voting: {{council}} Seat is not in voting period.

pre-eval.headline: Current Voting Results
pre-eval.voting-results-live: Voting is still in progress. There is still time to vote if you haven't yet.

nomination.headline: Nominate Self
nomination.already-nominated: This address has already nominated itself for a seat.

withdraw.headline: Withdraw Nomination
withdraw.subline: A candidate can withdrawal from the nomination process at any given time within the nomination period

edit.headline: Edit Your Nomination
edit.subline: You can only nominate for 1 seat at any given time. In order to change your nomination from one seat to another you must first select your new seat and click save. You will be need to sign 2 transactions in order to change.
edit.banner: You will need to sign 2 transactions to change seat.

vote.headline: Voting For {{council}} Seat Nominee
vote.subline: You are about to vote for this nominee. If you are happy to proceed, click the submit vote button.

voting-power.headline: Your Total Voting Power Is On L1 & L2:

withdraw-vote.headline: Uncast Vote
withdraw-vote.subline: You are about to uncast your vote. Select uncast vote button to continue.

editProfile.headline: Edit Profile
editProfile.subheadline: Update your profile with more information about yourself
